title: Why you should play Kindred this Australia Day

embed.description: Australia's a wondrous country, with many intricate celebrations, none of which any of the of the population know what they're for. Therefore this Australia day, You should play Kindred! Because Mr4Eva told you to! -- LINKS: Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/mister4eva Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/mister4eva Partnership: http://www.freedom.tm/via/mr4eva
